TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit GraphExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides extension methods for creating Graph queries of type . These queries will execute against Azure DocumentDB collection.
Docs.remarks: The class extends class to enable you to express graph traversal and CRUD operations over data persisted in a Azure DocumentDB collection. The returned objects wrap the actual query execution, and enumerating these objects forces Azure DocumentDB queries to be executed.

Docs.param: The DocumentClient instance to execute the query.
The DocumentCollection that contains the graph to query.
The options for processing the query result feed. For details .
The GraphSON mode to use when returning the results of the query.
Docs.summary: Method to create a Gremlin expression to create/query graph elements stored under an Azure CosmosDB collection.
Docs.returns: An that can evaluate the query.
